revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Watchguard XTM 330 Firewall Appliance (WG330061).jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = Watchguard XTM 330 Firewall Appliance |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = WatchGuard_XTM_330 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = WatchGuard |model = XTM 330 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = NC5AE7 |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = MB-XTM330 V1.0 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale;P2020;P2020NSE2KC; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = Power |cpu1_type_rev = QorIQ |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 800 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F4G08ABADA; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2chip = Spansion;S29AL016J70TFI02; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83BFR-H9C; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6171; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 6 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2011.03;; |stockos = Linux;3.0.34;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1.2 |pwr_poe_type = <!-- Type of POE --> |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, console port,, RJ-45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = metal case, heatsink, fan, RTC w/ battery |addchip = I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, Hardware Monitor;Winbond;W83793G;;1;,,, 4K I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C04C;;1;,,, USB 2.0 (Hi-Speed) PHY;SMSC;USB3300;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;3;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;TI;MA3232C;;2;,,, 30V 11A N-Channel MOSFET;Niko-Sem;P1203BV;;6;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Regulator;Richtek;RT9018A;;2;,,, 2 Output PCIe Gen 1 Clock Source;IDT;IDT5V41129;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;TI;SN74LVC08A;;4;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;National Semiconductor;LM358M;;1;,,, 5V Tolerant Low Voltage Octal Transparent Latch;Fairchild;74LCX373;;1;,,, +5V Powered RS-232 Transmitters/Receiver;Intersil;HIN232;;1;,,, 48MHz 80C51 Compatible Microcontroller;Megawin Tech;89E58A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 10.0.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = readwrite |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EOL |eoldate = 07/09/2020 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00632TZAK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Project:Network/Hardware Specific/WatchGuard|WatchGuard}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' P2020 :Dual Core PowerPC (@1.0GHz) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 2MB (SPI), 512MB (NAND) Flash *Network: 7x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 100-240V C13
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/XTM_3_Series_HardwareGuide_XTM_330.pdf Hardware Guide] * [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/quick_start_guides/xtm-330_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide]
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{/Serial info}}
